name: VA Talks
description:
VA Talks is a virtual assistance company situated in the heart of Kolkata, West Bengal, India. A young start up, VA Talks came into operation in the year 2015. A virtual assistance company is a company that delivers any sort of professional assistance to its providers virtually.
A VA (virtual assistant) is a business professional who provides business assistance through the use of Internet and its various applications such as email, Skype, instant messaging, and any modes of online communication. Our services are 24x7. Thus, irrespective of what time a particular task needs to be executed, a virtual assistance from our organization is always available to execute it. Moreover, all the executives are experts in various specializations, therefore, enabling the best possible results in accordance to the current market.
